# Import Data

```{r}
library(readr)
library(janitor)
music <- read_csv("~/Documents/EDA/tcc_ceds_music.csv")%>%
  clean_names()
View(music)
```

# Checking Assertions
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(assertr)
library(corrplot)

#initial exploration of variables
class(music)

music%>%
  summarise(min(release_date), max(release_date))

#check that values are between 0-1 for acousticness, instrumentalness, valence, energy, and age
music%>%
  assert(within_bounds(0,1), acousticness:energy)%>%
  assert(within_bounds(0,1), age)

#check for NAs
music%>%
  assert(not_na, artist_name:age)

```


# check for NAs
```{r}
music = na.omit(music)
#Min-Max Scaling 
normalize <- function(x) {
return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}

#new variables added 
Length_norm=normalize(music$len)

music<- music %>%
  mutate(Length_norm)%>%
  mutate(age_actual = 2019 - release_date)%>% 
  mutate(id = 1) %>% 
  mutate(id = cumsum(id))
```


# checking correlations
```{r}

new_t <- music %>% 
  select(age, dating:energy, Length_norm)
colnames(new_t)

# scatterplot matrix of the audio feature parameters
corrplot(cor(new_t))

```
# remove unwanted variables & capitalize column names 
```{r}
music_cleaned<-music%>%
  select(id, artist_name:len, danceability:age_actual)

rename_with(music_cleaned, toupper)

```

# export cleaned data set
```{r}
write.csv(music_cleaned, "~/Documents/EDA/EDA-project/clean-data/tcc_ceds_music_cleaned.csv")
```
